amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds to carry out enrichments such as artwork, landscaping, and bicycle and pedestrian improvements such as sidewalks, paths, plazas, site and station furniture, site lighting, signage, public artwork, bike facilities, and permanent fencing when processing New Start grant applications.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 28 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to carry out any enrichment for any New Start grant request.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Emmer (MN) amendment (A070) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 214 (Roll no. 325).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Emmer (MN) amendment (A070) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 214 (Roll no. 325).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A070) offered by Mr. Emmer (MN).
